definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: palate, roof of mouth, gums (NH id.; Aram. h.emko0 [[חִכָּא]] Ar. h.anakun palate, roof of mouth, jaws, lower part of mouth, lower jaw of horse, mouth, etc. Lane:659 Dozy:i. 332);—abs. ´[[ח]] Job 12:11 Job 34:3; sf. [[חִכִּי]] Pr 8:7 + 6 t., [[חִכְּךָ]] Ho 8:1, [[חִכֶָּךָ]] Ez Eze 3:26, Pr 24:13; chiefly poet., esp. WisdLt:—[[חִכֵח]] Ct So 7:10, [[חִכּוֹ]] La 4:4 + 2 t., [[חִכָּהּ]] Pr 5:3, [[חִכָּם]] Job 29:10; —palate, roof of mouth:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[אֶל־חִכְּךָ שׁׂפָר]] Ho 8:1 a trumpet to thy palate! (or gums; as in Eng., to thy lips); oft. c. [[לָשׁוֹן]], tongue clings ([[דבק]]) to [[הך]], expression for speechlessness Ez Eze 3:26, Job 29:10, as imprecation Ps 137:6; for the parching of extreme thirst La 4:4 ([[בַּצָּמָא]]), cf. Ps 22:16 MT [[יׇבֵּשׁ כַּחֶרֶשׂ כּׂחִי]] rd. [[חִכִּי]] for [[כחי]] v. Che:crit. n. (‖[[לְשׁוֹנִי מֻדְבָּק מַלְקוֹחָָי]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as organ of speech Pr 5:3, Pr 8:7 (both ‖[[שְׂפָתַיִם]]), Job 31:30, Job 33:2 [[דִּבְּרָה לְשׁוֹנִי בְחִכִּי]] (‖[[פָּתַחְתִּי פִי]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: as organ of taste Job 12:11, Job 34:3, [[פִּרְיוֹ מָתוֹק לְחִכִּי]] Ct So 2:3 his fruit was sweet to my palate, Pr 24:13 (implied sim. of wisdom as sweet to the soul); fig. of God's words as sweet ´[[לְח]] Ps 119:103 (‖[[פִּי]]); of taste as distinguishing misfortunes Job 6:30 (‖[[לָשׁוֹן]]; > others of speech); of keeping wickedness ´[[בְּתוֹח ח]] Job 20:18 (‖[[תַּחַת לָשׁוֹן]]), i.e. delighting in and prolonging the taste of it.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: nearly = mouth, as an element in personal sweetness and beauty Ct So 5:16, So 7:10.
